snippet: Southern California edged No. 7 Arizona, 103-101, on Saturday to improve to 11-0 at home for the first time since the 1974 season.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Southern California men's basketball team defeats Arizona, 103-101; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Southern California edged No. 7 Arizona, 103-101, on Saturday to improve to 11-0 at home for the first time since the 1974 season.

headline.print_headline: U.S.C. Upends Arizona in Four Overtimes
headline.main: U.S.C. Upends Arizona in Four Overtimes
